meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the November 13, 2023 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Recruiting and Retention Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the recruitment and retention strategies for public safety personnel.

agenda_items.title: Violent Crime Reduction Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the strategies and progress of the violent crime reduction plan.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Police Department’s Commitment to Transparency and Continuous Improvement
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the Dallas Police Department's initiatives for transparency and improvement.

agenda_items.title: Single Role Paramedic/Welfare Critical Response Team Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Single Role Paramedic and Welfare Critical Response Team.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire-Rescue’s Proposed Changes to Promotional Standards
agenda_items.description: Discussion on proposed changes to the promotional standards within Dallas Fire-Rescue.

agenda_items.title: Memorials for Fallen First Responders Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the memorials for fallen first responders.

agenda_items.title: 2025 Proposed Legislative Priorities - Public Safety
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the proposed legislative priorities for public safety in 2025.
